text:
Looking nice ! Feels like you are quite familiar with this environment,  is this a real bathroom. 
Notes wise;
If you put the camera so close to the hooks then I think you need to up res them , as you can see the facets in the outline. 
The image of the steps outside the window feel lower res than the rest. I guess that's just the hdr sphere. But something to keep in mind. 
Aparrt from that I think it's looking lovely and just keep going,  injecting life into it with details. Things like The mirror being perpendicular to the wall ( I have one like that and they always tilt up or down a bit , regardless of how I want it to stay )
Also if its going to be a crisp and clean environment this matters less , but if you a are going for reality then the material pass where you grunge it up will make all the difference. 

I hope you are enjoying it mate. Keep at it. Im sure once you are done it's going to be great on your show reel.
